originalTitle: 'Affront to humanity': Sudan slams Uganda for hosting RSF paramilitary boss
title: 'Affront to humanity': Sudan slams Uganda for hosting RSF paramilitary boss
content: Sudan accuses Uganda of flouting international law by meeting Rapid Support Forces boss Mohamed Hamdan Dagalo.

originalTitle: Catch of the day: Pictures from spectacular Nigerian fishing festival
title: Catch of the day: Pictures from spectacular Nigerian fishing festival
content: Days of competition culminate in a fishing contest rooted in efforts to cement local peace.

originalTitle: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
title: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
content: In a rare occurence, three soldiers were handed jail terms for killings in the troubled Anglophone region.

originalTitle: Man killed after entering perimeter of Trump’s Mar-a-Lago resort
title: Man killed after entering perimeter of Trump’s Mar-a-Lago resort
content: The incident in Florida took place on Sunday when US President Donald Trump was in Washington, DC.

originalTitle: France to summon US ambassador over comments on far-right activist’s death
title: France to summon US ambassador over comments on far-right activist’s death
content: Top French diplomat says his government rejects any attempt to use Quentin Deranque's death 'for political purposes'.

originalTitle: Video: Hundreds of far-right anti-Islam protesters march in Manchester
title: Video: Hundreds of far-right anti-Islam protesters march in Manchester
content: Hundreds of far-right anti-Islam marched through Manchester on Saturday, demanding mass deportations of migrants.

originalTitle: Iran students stage first large anti-government protests since deadly crackdown
title: Iran students stage first large anti-government protests since deadly crackdown
content: Student protesters honoured thousands of those killed when nationwide mass protests were put down by Iranian authorities last month.

originalTitle: Pakistan launches deadly strikes on Afghanistan
title: Pakistan launches deadly strikes on Afghanistan
content: Pakistan says the strikes were retaliation for recent suicide bombings in the country.

originalTitle: US ambassador's Israel comments condemned by Arab and Muslim nations
title: US ambassador's Israel comments condemned by Arab and Muslim nations
content: Mike Huckabee suggested Israel would be justified in taking much of the Middle East on Biblical grounds.

originalTitle: 'Educate yourself and your kids' - Fofana and Mejbri racially abused
title: 'Educate yourself and your kids' - Fofana and Mejbri racially abused
content: Burnley midfielder Hannibal Mejbri and Chelsea defender Wesley Fofana have spoken out on social media after being sent racist abuse in the aftermath of the clubs' Premier League match on Saturday.

title: 'Unforeseen circumstances' delay Aberdeen boss hunt
content: Aberdeen's search for a new head coach has been delayed by "unforeseen circumstances", with chairman Dave Cormack stressing the club "mustn't rush or compromise" an appointment.

originalTitle: Guardiola tells team to chill with cocktails as Man City pile pressure on Arsenal
title: Guardiola tells team to chill with cocktails as Man City pile pressure on Arsenal
content: As Manchester City continue to crank up the pressure on Arsenal, Pep Guardiola tells his players to take three days off to "enjoy life" with "caipirinhas and daiquiris".
